Name: Ninjas in the Dungeon
About the game: Introduction to the Game Ninja in the Dungeon is a Rouglike shooting game. He will grow as you continue to explore, in randomly generated level cards, you can collect precious loot, discover hidden secrets, challenge enemies of all difficulties, and chat with lovely merchants and shopkeepers, buy powerful items to gain an edge. Here, the only thing you have to do is get stronger and survive. Features of the Game ⚪ Randomly generated maps, each one a different experience ⚪ Rich variety of weapons, different fighting styles ⚪ Growing protagonist system, let you feel the fun of mowing the grass in the late Operation of the Game WASD operation movement, left mouse button shooting, E key interaction
